create.prompt:
Use case: investor/influencer promo clip for Traitors Fantasy Draft
Primary request: Create a 12-second high-energy trailer with seven fast beats: problem hook with messy chats and spreadsheets, product hero reveal, draft flow interactions, weekly prediction flow, transparent leaderboard trust moment, admin merge operations, and a CTA end card
Scene/background: premium UI montage, dynamic overlays, social-first framing
Subject: app interface panels and abstract UI elements only, no real people
Action: fast progression from problem to product to proof to CTA
Camera: alternating push-ins, smooth pans, quick cuts on beat
Lighting/mood: confident, polished, energetic
Color palette: charcoal, steel blue, electric cyan, white, signal red accents
Style/format: modern SaaS promo, crisp typography overlays, 16:9
Timing/beats: seven beats across 12 seconds, final 1.5 seconds hold on CTA
Audio: driving cinematic electronic pulse, no lyrics
Text (verbatim): "Partner with Traitors Fantasy Draft"
Constraints: no real people, no copyrighted characters, no external logos
Avoid: face generation, celebrity likenesses, jitter, flicker, illegible text
